Unto the <S%G3588><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which is <S%G5607><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Corinth, <S%G2882><s%> to them that are sanctified <S%G37><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> called <S%G2822><s%> to be saints, <S%G40><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that in <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> call upon <S%G1941><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> theirs <S%G848><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ours: <S%G2257><s%>

Grace <S%G5485><s%> be unto you, <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace, <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

I thank <S%G2168><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> on your behalf, <S%G4012><s%> <S%G5216><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which is given <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

That <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every thing <S%G3956><s%> ye are enriched <S%G4148><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> utterance, <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> knowledge; <S%G1108><s%>
Even as <S%G2531><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> testimony <S%G3142><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> was confirmed <S%G950><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you: <S%G5213><s%>

So that <S%G5620><s%> ye <S%G5209><s%> <S%G3361><s%> come behind <S%G5302><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> gift; <S%G5486><s%> waiting for <S%G553><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> coming <S%G602><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> shall also <S%G2532><s%> confirm <S%G950><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> the end, <S%G5056><s%> that ye may be blameless <S%G410><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

God <S%G2316><s%> is faithful, <S%G4103><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> ye were called <S%G2564><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the fellowship <S%G2842><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I beseech <S%G3870><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye all <S%G3956><s%> speak <S%G3004><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> same thing, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that there be <S%G5600><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> divisions <S%G4978><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you; <S%G5213><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> that ye be <S%G5600><s%> perfectly joined together <S%G2675><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> same <S%G846><s%> mind <S%G3563><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> same <S%G846><s%> judgment. <S%G1106><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> it hath been declared <S%G1213><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> which are of the house of Chloe, <S%G5514><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> contentions <S%G2054><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you. <S%G5213><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> I say, <S%G3004><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> every one <S%G1538><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> saith, <S%G3004><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> <S%G3303><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> of Paul; <S%G3972><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> of Apollos; <S%G625><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> of Cephas; <S%G2786><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Is Christ <S%G5547><s%> divided? <S%G3307><s%> was <S%G3361><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> crucified <S%G4717><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you? <S%G5216><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> were ye baptized <S%G907><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> of Paul? <S%G3972><s%>

I thank <S%G2168><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I baptized <S%G907><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of you, <S%G5216><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> Crispus <S%G2921><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Gaius; <S%G1050><s%>
Lest <S%G3363><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> should say <S%G2036><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I had baptized <S%G907><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> mine own <S%G1699><s%> name. <S%G3686><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> I baptized <S%G907><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> household <S%G3624><s%> of Stephanas: <S%G4734><s%> besides, <S%G3063><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> whether I baptized any <S%G1536><s%> <S%G907><s%> other. <S%G243><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to baptize, <S%G907><s%> but <S%G235><s%> to preach the gospel: <S%G2097><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of words, <S%G3056><s%> lest <S%G3363><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> cross <S%G4716><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> should be made of none effect. <S%G2758><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> preaching <S%G3056><s%> of <S%G3588><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> cross <S%G4716><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> to them that perish <S%G622><s%> <S%G3303><s%> foolishness; <S%G3472><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are saved <S%G4982><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> I will destroy <S%G622><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> wise, <S%G4680><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will bring to nothing <S%G114><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> understanding <S%G4907><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> prudent. <S%G4908><s%>

Where <S%G4226><s%> is the wise? <S%G4680><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> is the scribe? <S%G1122><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> is the disputer <S%G4804><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world? <S%G165><s%> hath not <S%G3780><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> made foolish <S%G3471><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world? <S%G2889><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> after that <S%G1894><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> it pleased <S%G2106><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> foolishness <S%G3472><s%> of preaching <S%G2782><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> them that believe. <S%G4100><s%>
For <S%G1894><s%> the <S%G2532><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> require <S%G154><s%> a sign, <S%G4592><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Greeks <S%G1672><s%> seek after <S%G2212><s%> wisdom: <S%G4678><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> preach <S%G2784><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> crucified, <S%G4717><s%> unto the Jews <S%G2453><s%> a <S%G3303><s%> stumblingblock, <S%G4625><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> unto the Greeks <S%G1672><s%> foolishness; <S%G3472><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> which are called, <S%G2822><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Greeks, <S%G1672><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> foolishness <S%G3474><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> wiser <S%G4680><s%> than men; <S%G444><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> weakness <S%G772><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> stronger <S%G2478><s%> than men. <S%G444><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> ye see <S%G991><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> calling, <S%G2821><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> how that <S%G3754><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> wise men <S%G4680><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> mighty, <S%G1415><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> noble, <S%G2104><s%> are called:

But <S%G235><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath chosen <S%G1586><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> foolish things <S%G3474><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> confound <S%G2617><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wise; <S%G4680><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath chosen <S%G1586><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> weak things <S%G772><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> confound <S%G2617><s%> the things which are mighty; <S%G2478><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> base things <S%G36><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> things which are despised, <S%G1848><s%> hath God <S%G2316><s%> chosen, <S%G1586><s%> yea, and <S%G2532><s%> things <S%G3588><s%> which are <S%G5607><s%> not, <S%G3361><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> bring to naught <S%G2673><s%> things that are: <S%G5607><s%>
That <S%G3704><s%> no <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3361><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> should glory <S%G2744><s%> in his presence. <S%G1799><s%> <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> him <S%G846><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> of <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is made <S%G1096><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sanctification, <S%G38><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> redemption: <S%G629><s%>
That, <S%G2443><s%> according as <S%G2531><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> He <S%G3588><s%> that glorieth, <S%G2744><s%> let him glory <S%G2744><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
